text: Ceratozamia norstogii is a species of plant in the family Zamiaceae. It is endemic to the Sierra Madre de Chiapas, in Chiapas and Oaxaca states of southwestern Mexico. It is an Endangered species, threatened by habitat loss. ==References== norstogii Category:Endemic flora of Mexico Category:Flora of Chiapas Category:Flora of Oaxaca Category:Sierra Madre de Chiapas Category:Endangered biota of Mexico Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Ceratozamia norstogii
